mTextMaterial.description: Base material to be used for text component material instances

mIconMaterial.description: Base material to be used for icon material instances

mBackgroundMaterial.description: Base material to be used for sign background material instances

mBackgroundMeshMaterialIndex.description: The index in the sign mesh material array pointing to the screen / background material

mTextMaterialColorParam.description: Parameter name of color adjustment FVector inside the text material

mIconMaterialColorParam.description: Parameter name of color adjustment FVector inside the icon material

mBackgroundMaterialColorParam.description: Parameter name of color adjustment FVector inside the background material
